de.esoco.lib.comm

Class JsonRpcEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.expression.function.AbstractFunction<org.obrel.core.Relatable,Connection>
        • de.esoco.lib.comm.Endpoint
          • de.esoco.lib.comm.JsonRpcEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.Fluent<Endpoint>, java.util.function.Function<org.obrel.core.Relatable,Connection>, org.obrel.core.FluentRelatable<Endpoint>, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class JsonRpcEndpoint
extends Endpoint
    An endpoint that communicates via JSON RPC with a wrapped, transport-specific endpoint. In the current implementation only the HTTP(S) transport protocol is supported.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatch<P,R>
      The base class for for JSON RPC requests that execute batch calls.
      static class  JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatchCall
      A batch invocation of JSON RPC methods that dispatches the responses to different consumers for each method call.
      static class  JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatchMethod<P,R>
      A JSON RPC batch call that invokes a single method multiple times with different parameters.
      static class  JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<P,R>
      A JSON RPC request that calls a certain RPC method.
      static class  JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcRequest<P,R>
      The base class for communication methods that call a JSON RPC method over the actual transport endpoint.

        Endpoint.UserInfoField

        public JsonRpcEndpoint()

    • Method Detail

      • batchCall

        public static JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatchCall batchCall()
        Creates a new JSON RPC batch call that can invoke multiple RPC methods at once. New methods must be added to the batch call object by invoking one of it's methods to add a request.
        Returns:
        The new JSON RPC batch request object

      • batchCall

        @SafeVarargs
public static <P,R> JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcBatchMethod<P,R> batchCall(JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<P,R> rMethod,
                                                                                    P... rDefaultParams)
        Creates a new JSON RPC batch call that invokes an RPC method multiple times with different call parameters.
        Parameters:
        rMethod - The RPC methods to call
        rDefaultParams - The default call parameters
        Returns:
        The new JSON RPC batch request object

      • call

        public static JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> call(java.lang.String sMethod)
        Returns a new JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod for a generic RPC invocation.
        Parameters:
        sMethod - The name of the method to invoke
        Returns:
        The new method

      • call

        public static <R> JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<java.lang.Object,R> call(java.lang.String sMethod,
                                                                         java.lang.Class<R> rResultType)
        Returns a new JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod with a generic parameters argument and a specific result datatype.
        Parameters:
        sMethod - The name of the method to invoke
        rResultType - The datatype to parse the result field of responses with
        Returns:
        The new method

      • call

        public static <P,R> JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<P,R> call(java.lang.String sMethod,
                                                            P rDefaultParams,
                                                            java.lang.Class<R> rResultType)
        Returns a new JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod with specific datatypes for the method parameters and the call result.
        Parameters:
        sMethod - The name of the method to invoke
        rDefaultParams - Default parameters for the call (can be NULL)
        rResultType - The datatype to parse the result field of responses with
        Returns:
        The new method

      • call

        public static <P,R> JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod<P,R> call(java.lang.String sMethod,
                                                            P rDefaultParams,
                                                            java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,R> fParseResponse)
        Returns a new JsonRpcEndpoint.JsonRpcMethod with specific datatypes for the method parameters and a parse function for the response.
        Parameters:
        sMethod - The name of the method to invoke
        rDefaultParams - Default parameters for the call (can be NULL)
        fParseResponse - A function that parses the JSON response string into the result type
        Returns:
        The new method

      • closeConnection

        protected void closeConnection(Connection rConnection)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Closes any resources that have been acquired on initializing the given connection. Any exception thrown by this method will be converted into a CommunicationException.
        Specified by:
        closeConnection in class Endpoint
        Parameters:
        rConnection - The connection to close
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any kind of exception may be thrown

      • initConnection

        protected void initConnection(Connection rConnection)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Must be implemented to initialize any resources that are needed to use the given connection. Any exception thrown by this method will be converted into a CommunicationException.
        Specified by:
        initConnection in class Endpoint
        Parameters:
        rConnection - The connection to initialize
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any kind of exception may be thrown
